name: Tejas Pandya
top_product: Real-Time Accounting Engine: “Exact profit, every month—not feelings, numbers.” Zero-Friction Implementation: “Switch systems with zero chaos, 100% compliance on Day-1.” Team Uplift & CFO Lite: “Turn accountants into MIS athletes; get a CFO when it matters.”
ideal_referral: Who: Manufacturing units in/around Ahmedabad with ₹5+ crore turnover, where the owner doesn’t get an exact monthly profit or the books are maintained only for tax filing. Where (Priority GIDCs & Industrial Clusters): Odhav, Vatva, Narol, Naroda, Kathwada, Rakhial, Sarkhej, Aslali, Changodar, Sanand, Bavla, Bareja, Naroda GIDC Phase I/II, Ahmedabad Apparel Park, plus nearby Chhatral, Kalol, Kadi, Khatraj, Moraiya. Typical signs they need us: Multiple bank accounts/branches and frequent vendor changes Inventory vs. GST mismatch, delayed reconciliations No real-time dashboard or monthly P&L by product/line Team needs upskilling to keep pace with GST/TDS/IT updates What we deliver: Live dashboards (profit, cash flow, receivables, inventory) Books–GST–Bank daily/weekly reconciliation On-site & on-call training for accounting staff Virtual CFO for pricing, margins, and compliance strategy Best decision-maker to introduce: Owner/MD/CEO, or Head of Accounts/Finance. Perfect referral cue: “We’re growing, but I don’t know my exact monthly profit,” or “Entries are pending; we’ll close books at year-end.” KB Global FinCon LLP — Real-time accounts. Exact profit. Confident decisions.
top_problem_solved: We solve the five biggest headaches business owners face: Delayed books, messy migrations, untrained teams, no real-time profit view, and overlapping compliances.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is about how a single one-to-one changed everything. A fellow member connected me with a manufacturing client who was struggling to understand his real profit — his books were delayed, GST mismatched, and decisions were made on estimates. Through BNI, I got the opportunity to step in, implement a real-time accounting system, train his staff, and build a live profit dashboard. Within three months, he knew his exact profit, optimized his pricing, and saved lakhs in tax and leakages. That moment reminded me why BNI works — it’s not just about referrals, it’s about trust and transformation. BNI gave me a platform to show that when numbers become clear, businesses grow confidently. BNI didn’t just help me find clients — it helped me create success stories.
